comment: Prove us wrong. You can't and you won't, because we are right. But like any leftist, you'll cry about the truth and dig in your heels and name call.
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / prove-01

            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (w / wrong-04
                  :ARG1 y)
            :ARG2 (w2 / we))
      :snt2 (a / and
            :op1 (p2 / possible-01
                  :polarity -
                  :ARG1 p
                  :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                  :ARG1 w
                  :ARG1 y2))

      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 y2
      :ARG1 w
      :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
            :ARG0 (r / right-06
                  :ARG1 (w3 / we)))
      :snt3 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG2 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (c3 / cry-02
                        :ARG0 (y3 / you)
                        :ARG1 (t / truth))
                  :op2 (d / dig-01
                        :ARG0 y3
                        :ARG2 (a3 / and

                                    :poss y3)
                              :op2 (c4 / call-01
                                    :ARG2 (n / name))))
                  :ARG1-of (r2 / resemble-01
                        :ARG2 (p3 / person
                              :ARG1-of (l / left-19)
                              :mod (a4 / any))))))

comment: Please avoid using hateful anti Semitic slurs and sexually vulgar terms.
amr:
